page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{ {PARENTS' PLACE OF WORK SURVEY }
A survey of all Junior age children was undertaken. The subject was the place of work of parents. There were six categories.
1 works in Gilberdyke village. 2 works on the land immediately around the village of Gilberdyke. 3 works in a feeder village to Gilberdyke - Blacktoft, Faxfleet, Yokefleet, Sandholme. 4 works in the Hull area. 5 works in the Goole/Howden area. 6 works outside all of these.
The total results were as follows:
Category 1 2 3 4 5 6 23 11 14 41 15 25
